references.reason: This is an earlier version of the current work and lays the groundwork for many of the ideas presented.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This work introduces the concept of using video generation models as simulators, which is a core component of the GenEx platform.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: Stable video diffusion is used to achieve high-quality video generation in GenEx.
Flux.1 is a foundational model used for text-to-image and subsequently for text-to-panorama generation in this work.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: Latent Diffusion Models are utilized within GenEx for generating high-quality and consistent panoramic worlds.
